original_text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom: but the friend of the bridegroom, which standeth and heareth him, rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom's voice: this my joy therefore is fulfilled.
korean_text: 신부를 취하는 자는 신랑이나 서서 신랑의 음성을 듣는 친구가 크게 기뻐하나니 나는 이러한 기쁨으로 충만하였노라

sentences.original_text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom
but the friend of the bridegroom

sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 서서 그의 말을 듣는 자는

sentences.original_text: rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom's voice
this my joy therefore is fulfilled
